name: Train Simulator: Class 57 Rail Tour Loco Add-On
summary: The re-engineered, multi-purpose Class 57 locomotive in special Rail Tours livery, with scenarios created for the Settle-Carlisle route, is now available for Train Simulator. Rebuilt from the Class 47, the Class 57s entered service in 1997 and are affectionately known as 'Bodysnatchers' or 'Zombies', by virtue of their modification from...
